thread.title: IATA Study on NDC Finds it Valuable But Mostly Unknown to Agents
thread.title_full: IATA Study on NDC Finds it Valuable But Mostly Unknown to Agents

title: IATA Study on NDC Finds it Valuable But Mostly Unknown to Agents
text:
Last updated: 11:38 AM ET, Fri October 23 2015 IATA Study on NDC Finds it Valuable But Mostly Unknown to Agents Travel Technology | Robin Amster | October 23, 2015 
Photo courtesy of Thinkstock 
Despite the significant values the controversial New Distribution Capability (NDC) offers, it will require “massive work” by the airlines and travel technology companies to provide travel agencies with the tools they need to use NDC, according to a new study from the International Air Transport Association (IATA). < Do you want to read the full story? You must be a registered travel professional with an active account to view the full story. Are you a Travel Agent? Log in to your account now, or register for free! Sign In / Register
